modName: Food Tweaks - stamina regen tweak and more
summary: Changes and enhances cooked foods (craftable AND non-craftable alike) effects to make cooking more rewarding, while fixing infinite stamina usage from regenerate stamina effect of foods.
descriptionHtml:
Edit: I\'ve added a version of this mod integrated with a needs mod called \"Nord Needs\" which can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21384

Basically the integrated esp file already has food attributes in \"Nord Needs\" mod, so you probably won\'t need Nord Needs esp file(1.5 version). If you insist on using the Nord Needs esp file along with integrated food tweaks esp, load the food tweaks esp after Nord Needs esp, or changed foods tweaks won\'t be applied.


A little tweak mod that changes almost every effect of cooked foods in vanilla skyrim.

Purpose of this mod is primarily to fix the foods that give regenerate stamina for 720 secs which allows the players to use power attacks and shield bash infinitely for the duration of the effect because you can carryout power attacks and bashes with only 1 stamina. This basically renders useless any investment into stamina, stamina potions and static stamina fortify or restore effect from foods.

To overcome this issue I\'ve shortened the amount of stamina regeneration from 720 secs to 60secs. This way you can tactically balance your usage of static stamina restore and stamina regeneration from cooked foods which still allows limitless power attacks and bashes, but only for much shorter time. Naturally this makes investing in stamina worthwhile too! You can no longer clear a dungeon with one sip of vegetable soup, and if you insist on having stamina regeneration effect all the time you\'re gonna need 12times the amount of food than before, which means a LOT of farmwork or tedious vendor rushes throughout Skyrim.

Another change I made is adding fortify magicka effect to various sweets, such as apple pie or boiled cream treat. One exception is sweetroll, which doesnt\' have fortify magicka effect, but boasts the largest static health restore effect of all foods in Skyrim.

Last but not least I\'ve increased most foods\' static restore health/stamina effect to compensate for making stamina regen foods less useful. Complete list of changes I\'ve made is as follows:


<Craftable Food Items>
Apple Cabbage Stew : Restore stamina 15 pts Restore health 10 pts -> Restore stamina 20 pts Restore health 15 pts

Beef Stew : Fortify Stamina 25 pts for 720 secs, Restore Stamina 2 pts for 720 secs -> Fortify Stamina 50 pts for 720 secs, Restore Stamina 2 pts for 60 secs

Cabbage Potato Soup : Restore Health 10 pts, Restore Stamina 10pts -> Restore Health 10 pts, Restore Stamina 30pts

Cooked Beef : Restore Health 10pts -> Restore Health 20pts

Grilled Chicken Breast : Restore Health 5pts -> Restore Health 10pts

Horker Loaf : Restore Health 10 pts -> Restore Health 20 pts

Horker Stew : Restore Stamina 15 pts Restore Health 15 pts Restore Health 1 pt for 720 secs -> Restore Stamina 15 pts Restore Health 30 pts Restore Health 1 pt for 720 secs

Horse Haunch : Restore Health 10 pts -> Restore Health 20 pts

Leg of Goat Roast : Restore Health 10 pts -> Restore Health 20 pts

Mammoth Steak : Restore Health 10 pts -> Restore Health 30 pts

Pheasant Roast : Restore Health 5 pts -> Restore Health 10 pts

Rabbit Haunch : Restore Health 5 pts -> Restore Health 10 pts

Salmon Steak : Restore Health 5 pts -> Restore Health 10 pts, Restore Stamina 1 pts for 30 secs

Tomato Soup : Restore Health 10 pts Restore Stamina 10 pts -> Restore Health 15 pts Restore Stamina 20 pts

Vegetable Soup : Restore Health 1 pt for 720 secs Restore Stamina 1 pt for 720 secs -> Restore Health 1 pt for 720 secs Restore Stamina 1 pt for 60 secs

Venison Chop : Restore Health 5 pts -> Restore Health 15 pts

Venison Stew : Restore Stamina 15 pts Restore Health 1 pt for 720 secs Restore Stamina 1 pt for 720 secs -> Restore Stamina 30 pts Restore Health 1 pt for 720 secs Restore Stamina 1 pt for 60 secs


<Non-Craftable Food Items>
Apple Pie : Restore Health 10 pts -> Restore Health 20 pts Fortify Magicka 50 pts for 360 secs

Baked Potatoes : Restore Health 5 pts -> Restore Health 10 pts

Boiled Creme Treat : Restore Health 10 pts -> Restore Health 30 pts Fortify Magicka 50 pts for 360 secs

Grilled Leeks : Restore Health 6 pts -> Restore Health 12 pts

Honey Nut Treat : Restore Health 5 pts -> Restore Health 15 pts Fortify Magicka 50 pts for 360 secs

Long Taffy Treat : Restore Health 10 pts Restore Stamina 5 pts -> Restore Health 15 pts Restore Stamina 5 pts Fortify Magicka 50 pts for 360 secs

Mammoth Cheese Bowl : Restore Health 10 pts Restore Stamina 15 pts -> Restore Health 20 pts Restore Stamina 30 pts

Seared Slaughterfish : Restore Health 5 pts -> Restore Health 10 pts

Sweet Roll : Restore Health 5 pts -> Restore Health 50 pts
author: Holemole
